queue.title: Mojito
queue.description: A refreshing cocktail with white rum, fresh lime juice, mint leaves, sugar, and soda water.

menuItems.title: Mojito
menuItems.description: A refreshing cocktail with white rum, fresh lime juice, mint leaves, sugar, and soda water.

menuItems.title: Old Fashioned
menuItems.description: A classic cocktail made with bourbon or rye whiskey, sugar, Angostura bitters, and an orange twist.

menuItems.title: Margarita
menuItems.description: A tangy blend of tequila, triple sec, fresh lime juice, and a salted rim.

menuItems.title: Espresso Martini
menuItems.description: A rich and smooth cocktail with vodka, espresso, coffee liqueur, and a touch of sugar syrup.

menuItems.title: Whiskey Sour
menuItems.description: A perfect blend of whiskey, fresh lemon juice, sugar, and egg white for a silky finish.
